emuInput.TitMainTitle: Out-of-town guests for Butler - Jones wedding, front row from left: Sara Writt Dunstan, Juanita Evans, Ruth Shipley, Fai Rucker, Ethel Jenkins; second row: Dorothy Perkins, Mabel Page Johnson; standing: Frankie Dean, Dorothy Gillespie, Doris Reynolds Attwood, Lydia Williams, and Mrs. Stephen T. Brooks posed on staircase in home of Corinne Lindsay
emuInput.CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper June 26, 1954, pg. 11, reads: "Visitors to Pittsburgh - The gorgeous group of socialites who came to Pittsburgh last week-end to attend the Butler - Jones wedding included relatives of the bride and close friends of the bride's mother, Mrs. Harold Butler (Billie). Shown here, front row, Mrs. Sara Writt Dunstan, N. Y.; Mrs. Juanita Evans, Cleveland; Mrs. Ruth Shipley, Baltimore - Washington; Mrs. Fai Rucker, Washington; Mrs. Ethel Jenkins, Cleveland. Second row: Dorothy Perkins, D. C., and Mrs. Mabel Page Johnson, Johnstown, Pa. Standing are Mrs. Frankie Dean, Washington; Mrs. Dorothy Gillespie, Cleveland; Mrs. Doris Reynolds Attwood and Lydia Williams of D. C. and Mrs. Stephen T. Brooks, Wilmington, Del. - Harris Photo."
